Text: REGreat to hear from you an Astros game and or a drink would be greatI will be out of town until about the th myself Will talk to you soon Marc Original Message From mailto Sent Monday July AM To Subject RE Hey Havent spoken to you in a while Lets get a drink sometime soon Im taking a week and a half off starting July but after that maybe we can go a Astros game Congrats on Connor Hope everything is well Texas Ave Houston TX Original Message From mfindsen ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESmfindsenCmfindsenhoustonErrEcomEEN NRONcom Sent Tuesday June PM To Andy Weathers Nan Curtis Bruce Calvin John Arnold KEVIN CASEY Les Szabo Lane Neville Matt Arnold Subject Hey My wife Beth delivered a beautiful baby boy Connor McIntosh Please send me your address so that I can send out a birth announcement Thanks Marc winmaildat File winmaildat
interviewsJohn thanks for setting me up with Enron interviews Your hr group is very switched on Thanks again Marc winmaildat
